document_data.name: ''Monk's Belt''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Monk's belts''''' were enchanted [[belt]]s created by the [[monk]]s of the [[Lady's Hand Monastery]] in the [[Nether Mountains]].
document_data.Description: ''Monk's belts'' were very humble-looking [[rope]]s that were tied around the wearer's waist.
document_data.Powers: These belts possessed the enchantment that drastically improved monk's unarmed combat skills and made their blows unstoppable. ''Monk's belts'' also allowed their wearers to cast ''[[haste]]'' once a day.
document_data.History: In the [[1371 DR|Year of the Unstrung Harp, 1371 DR]], the monastery of the Lady's Hand was attacked by [[Morueme]] [[dragon]]s. The monks were able to fight the threat off using their [[Netherese]] magic, which included enchanting and equipping every monk with these belts.
